column4: how can I use remote desktop to control my friends comp, I wanna install a game for him and configure the game settings and the like
tell your friend to install vino
no, but he probably allready has it installed
i dont have it installed, so it is ikely he does not either
i dont see it anywhere, even when I type it in beagle
so I do "vncviewer 192.XXX.X.X" or whatever his ip is
we are both using broadband routers which use DHCP
port forwarding? you have to do that on your router... this has nothing to do with linux
how come win can do this without configuring port forwarding and linux cant
windows need port forwarind too for that
